org.jboss.seam
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  org.jboss.seam.Model
      org.jboss.seam.Entity

public class Entity
extends Model

Metamodel class for entity classes. A class will be identified as an entity class if it has an @Entity annotation.

Author:
Gavin King
